des: "Want to impress your friends? Try this colorful drink that has as much color in it as flavor! Not only does this look fun, it gets even better when the ice cubes melt! Try it also with strawberry, cherry or grape juice."
ins:
Pour the orange juice into ice cube trays and freeze them. Chill the cranberry juice in the refrigerator.
When the orange juice cubes are frozen, Place them in a large pitcher and pour in the cranberry juice.
